name: Broken Promises
description: What should a journalist investigate today, according to what has been promised in the past?

name: Datawrapper
description: Create charts and maps in seconds

name: Spending Stories
description: Ordered by the Open Knowledge Foundation it aims at improving fiscal literacy and providing greater awareness of budget data worldwide. It enables users to put amounts into perspective. The results take into account inflation in the country where the expenditure has been realized.

name: Wikileaks
description: US, Australia isolated in TPP negotiations

name: The Migrant Files
description:
Winner of the Datajournalism Awards 2014.
An open database containing information about over 29,000 people who died on their way to Europe.

name: Detective.io
description: Detective.io is a platform that hosts your investigation and lets you make powerful queries to mine it. Simply describe your field of study and detective.io builds the input interface as well as a state-of-the-art front-end.

name: Jeu d’influences
description:
Best cross-media piece at Liege Web Festival – 2014.
Have you ever faced a communication crisis? Jeu d'influences puts you right in front of it.

name: World of Work
description:
Ordered by Arte, World of Work is a survey that aims to measure the perception of the work by young Europeans and to compare their opinions with the ones of their  generations and older.
The project gathered more that 10 000 users.

name: n-ost
description: Map for the 10th anniversary of the EU-enlargement

name: Dragons Gifts
description: Start the tour and have a look at the Chinese projects in Africa, or explore the data and delve into the Chinese presence in the African continent.

name: Resonate 2014
description: They do not call themselves ‘artists’, but might be the future of art. We met the new-media art scene in Belgrade last week, at the Resonate festival.

name: Liveblog
description: Sourcefabric's Live Blog is an open source web app that enables journalists to provide immediate and ongoing coverage on rapidly evolving news events.
tags: Python, Flask, Angular.js, High Traffic, API

name: Energy
description: An interactive infographic about energy for municipal decision-makers and city planning

name: Bus Notifier
description: Display the public transport departure time for a given station in a little box for your bathroom. Colored light induces the relative imminence of your commute. Push the buttons to navigate through the next departures.
tags: Electronic, Welds, Raspberry Pi, Python, LED strip, API

name: Pillen
description: The colorimetric repository of little pills

name: Loopr
description:
L8pr is an Internet Player.
Create your own channel made of Youtube videos, Soundcloud tracks illustrated with GIFs;
add your tweets and RSS to have a complete, multimedia, multi-content looping channel.
Made with Benjamin Etco and love

name: Superdesk
description: Content creation, production, distribution, archiving and curation. Modular by design and developed continuously via partnerships with news organizations worldwide.
tags: Plugin System, Planning Component, Python, React, Angular.js, High Traffic, API

name: Jump
description: You are a pixel on the strip led and your controller is your phone. To survive you need to jump when the killer pixel comes to you. You can also fight back and send the killer in the other way.
tags: Electronic, LED strip, Raspberry Pi, Python, React

name: Smog Alarm
description: Smog Alarm is collecting the daily reports from the German Environmental Protection Agency who is measuring the air quality. This tool helps you to find your closest station and give you the possibility to track it by receiving Messenger messages, emails or RSS feeds. A messenger bot can help you to subscribe.
tags: Messenger Bot, Python, Django, D3.js, API, Map,

name: Totalbalance
description:
Crypto Asset Manager
Gives an overview of your crypto currencies which are coming from many different sources

name: Bias Tracker
description: Bias Tracker extracts entities from Facebook posts and analyzes the sentiment related to them. Then it displays charts that reflects the bias from the sources regarding the entities.

name: ISHHH
description: Carmen released her new limited collection of kimonos, crop tops and and jeans jackets.
